publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6547 Jack McConnell: Diana Awards—That the Parliament congratulates all of the winners at the 2010 Diana Awards, which recognise and support young people who have made an outstanding and selfless contribution to their communities and have inspired the lives of others; welcomes in particular the awards to James Keane from Clyde Valley High School and the Peer Tutors from Coltness High School, both in North Lanarkshire, and notes the exceptional commitment and enthusiasm that they have shown in their schools. Supported by: Marilyn Livingstone*

S3M-6547 Jack McConnell: Diana Awards—That the Parliament congratulates all of the winners at the 2010 Diana Awards, which recognise and support young people who have made an outstanding and selfless contribution to their communities and have inspired the lives of others; welcomes in particular the awards to James Keane from Clyde Valley High School and the Peer Tutors from Coltness High School, both in North Lanarkshire, and notes the exceptional commitment and enthusiasm that they have shown in their schools. Supported by: Marilyn Livingstone
S3M-6547 Diana Awards (lodged on 10 June 2010) Sarah Boyack*
